name: gfycat-companion-for-firefox
description: gfycat tools for Firefox. Icon by gfycat.com
author: Thomas Andersen<thomas@mr-andersen.no>

preferences.name: redirectDirectGifRequests
preferences.title: Redirect gif requests to gfycat
preferences.description: Automatically redirect to gfycat when a gif is directly requested

preferences.name: resImageViewerSupport
preferences.title: Enable gfycat in RES image viewer
preferences.description: Replaces gifs in the RES image viewer with gfycat videos (requires page refresh).
